com.jme3.input.event
Class InputEvent

java.lang.Object
  com.jme3.input.event.InputEvent
Direct Known Subclasses:
JoyAxisEvent, JoyButtonEvent, KeyInputEvent, MouseButtonEvent, MouseMotionEvent
public abstract class InputEvent
extends java.lang.Object

An abstract input event.

Field Summary
protected  boolean consumed
          If the input event has been consumed, meaning it is no longer valid and should not be forwarded to input listeners.
protected  long time
          Time in ticks when the event occured.
